# SnapDeck AI

> Turn photos and PDFs into flashcards instantly with on-device AI.

SnapDeck AI is an iOS app that uses Apple Intelligence to generate flashcards from photos of textbooks, lecture notes, handouts, and PDF documents. All processing happens on-device — no internet required, no cloud uploads, completely private.

## Key Facts

- Platform: iOS (iPhone 15 Pro and later, iOS 26+)
- AI: Apple Intelligence (on-device Foundation Models)
- Privacy: 100% on-device, no data collection, no accounts required
- Price: Free (3 decks/month), Premium available for unlimited use
- Developer: 12F ApS (https://12f.dk/)
- Website: https://snapdeck.12f.dk/

## Features

- Snap a photo of any study material to create flashcards
- Import PDFs for flashcard generation
- Type or paste text manually
- Interactive study mode with flip cards
- Progress tracking (know it / review it)
- On-device AI — no internet connection needed
- No accounts, no tracking, no data leaves the device

## Links

- [Home](https://snapdeck.12f.dk/)
